"products", you can send them in the endpoint URL, like so: var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open("GET", "https://reqres.in/api/products/3", true); xhr.onload = function(){ console.log(xhr.responseText); }; xhr.send();
It would be impossible for Reqres to know your application data, so the API will respond from a sample set of Pantone colour data { "data":{ "id":3, "name":"true red", "year":2002, "pantone_value":"19-1664" } }
It's entirely possible to get sample data into your interface in seconds!
